lead_paragraph: The proposal from the Labor Department offers strong protections and deserves praise.

headline.print_headline: Rules to Make Retirement Investing Safer
headline.main: Rules to Make Retirement Investing Safer

snippet: The proposal from the Labor Department offers strong protections and deserves praise.
abstract: Editorial supports Labor Department's proposed rules for ensuring that financial advisers act in best interest of their retiree clients by prohibiting pay increases for needlessly steering clients to high-cost strategies; notes pushback by opponents and says challenge for department is to guide well-crafted proposal through lawmaking process.
